article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: This piece was co-authored by Dr. Linda Gorman. Dr. Gorman is the Director of Heath Care Policy at the Independence Institute. One of the strangest things about Obamacare is that it is trying to force millions of families to obtain the wrong kind of insurance. When they turn it down, these families [...]
